entries.description: We learned about styling a webpage using css and keeping the html source code linked to the css styles with ids and classes.
Added Bootstrap styling to Daily Journal. Looks clean with little work to integrate. BANGARANG

Reviewing the POST method of HTTP requests with Steve.
This is more of a review of concepts that are covered in the daily journal exercises
applying the filter method to the moods
Practiced refactoring in localStorage with .getItem() and .setItem()
